cost.trigger: The user is hit by a creature's [Contact] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a creature's [Contact] attack.

Effect: The user freely uses Magic Powder on the triggering creature.

actions.name: Magic Powder
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have one of their Type(s) changed to Psychic for 5 activations. If they already have the Psychic Type, they lose one of their other Type(s), if applicable.

system.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a creature's [Contact] attack.

Effect: Connection - Magic Powder. The user freely uses Magic Powder on the triggering creature.
